description: These foam ear pads are used to enhance the fidelity of your music by reducing the vibration of your earbuds against your ear. The result is cleaner quality audio. Because each package contains 400 pieces, you may also use these to provide better hygiene by changing your ear pads each time a different person uses the earbuds. Originally manufactured exclusively for major electronic manufacturers and airlines in mass quantities, we are now offering these to the general public for a fraction of what you would pay through any other retailer or wholesaler.
title: Foam Earbud Earpad 400 Black Replacement Sponge Covers for Ipod Headsets
